verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Ahead of President Donald Trump 's campaign rally in Macomb County 's Washington Township] , [ARG0: Michigan Attorney General Bill Schuette] [V: said] [ARG1: the two will discuss policies , such as tax cuts and bringing jobs to Michigan] .

Ahead of President Donald Trump 's campaign rally in Macomb County 's Washington Township , Michigan Attorney General Bill Schuette said the two [V: will] discuss policies , such as tax cuts and bringing jobs to Michigan .
